Fire Dragon Bride Leona Blackbird:
It's a fortunate thing that such a skilled adventurer as yourself has commited to making yourself available to the cause. Here is your mission. Please select how much you can take on.

Intermediate Mission - Collect 600 High-grade Chaos Fragments
